speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: United States Steel announced a massive infusion of cash.
politifact_statement: United States Steel announced a massive infusion of cash. They are opening seven different plants.
verified_claim: U.S. Steel just announced that they are building six new steel mills.
verified_claim_article_title: No, U.S. Steel is not opening six new mills as Donald Trump said

sentence: They're opening up seven different plants.

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: Canada charges us close to 300% tariffs for dairy products going into Canada, which is essentially saying we don't want your dairy products -- this is a wall.
politifact_statement: Canada charges us close to 300 percent tariffs for dairy products going to Canada.
verified_claim: Canada charges the U.S. a 270 tariff on Dairy Products! They didnt tell you that, did they? Not fair to our farmers!
verified_claim_article_title: Donald Trump says Canada levies 270 percent tariff on dairy. That's basically righ

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: When we make a car, we sell it into China, and there's a 25% tariff.
politifact_statement: When we make a car, we sell it to China,  there is a 25 percent tariff.
verified_claim: When a car is sent to the United States from China, there is a Tariff to be paid of 2 12. When a car is sent to China from the United States, there is a Tariff to be paid of 25.
verified_claim_article_title: Is Donald Trump right that China slaps a 25 percent tariff on American cars?

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: The United States is paying close to 90% of the cost of protecting Europe, and I think that's wonderful.
politifact_statement: The United States is paying close to 90 percent of the costs of protecting Europe.
verified_claim: The United States was paying for anywhere from 70 to 90 percent of NATO, depending on the way you calculate.
verified_claim_article_title: Donald Trump misleads on US defense spending, NATO budge

speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: I have almost 400 people that haven't been approved by their slow-walking.
